We offer an Exhibition of the best currently available children's fiction, non fiction and picture books.

Book Exhibitions - available through Comprehensive Service and Library Support Service only

  • Special exhibitions targeted at particular curriculum areas.
  • Books selected in liaison with Literacy Consultants and Advisers.
  • Exhibitions held in all Centres and on the Exhibitions mobile library.
  • Discounts negotiated with suppliers.
  • Easy-to-use booklists to place orders.
  • Books and invoices sent direct to schools.
  • All books come ready to use, fully serviced with SLS stationery and protective book jackets.
  • Books can be exchanged through the Exchange service.
